com.github.xemiru.sponge.boxboy.button

Interface Button

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionButton, DummyButton, ScrollButton, SlotButton, ToggleButton

    public interface Button
    A clickable button in a Menu, represented by an ItemStack.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Optional<Animation<ItemStack>> getAnimatedRepresentative()
      Returns the animated representative of this Button.
      default ItemStack getRepresentative()
      Returns the ItemStack representing this Button.
      default boolean isAnimated()
      Deprecated. 
      While still usable for special implementations of non-static representatives through the use of getRepresentative(), it is recommended to implement getAnimatedRepresentative() instead.
      default boolean offer(OfferContext context)
      Offers a change of the ItemStack in the slot this Button occupies.
      default void onClick(ClickContext context)
      Performs an action when clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • isAnimated

        @Deprecated
default boolean isAnimated()
        Deprecated. While still usable for special implementations of non-static representatives through the use of getRepresentative(), it is recommended to implement getAnimatedRepresentative() instead.
        Returns whether or not this Button is animated.

        See Menu.isInvalidated() for how this value is used.

        Returns:
        if this Button is animated
        See Also:
        Menu.isInvalidated()

      • getRepresentative

        default ItemStack getRepresentative()
        Returns the ItemStack representing this Button.
        Returns:
        the ItemStack currently representing this Button

      • getAnimatedRepresentative

        default Optional<Animation<ItemStack>> getAnimatedRepresentative()
        Returns the animated representative of this Button.

        This representative takes priority over getRepresentative(). Should this return empty, menus will instead make use of the previous method to get the final representative item.

        Returns:
        the animated representative ItemStack of this Button

      • offer

        default boolean offer(OfferContext context)
        Offers a change of the ItemStack in the slot this Button occupies.

        This method is called before onClick(ClickContext).

        Parameters:
        context - the context associated with the offer
        Returns:
        if the transaction is allowed to succeed

      • onClick

        default void onClick(ClickContext context)
        Performs an action when clicked.

        This method is called after offer(OfferContext).

        Parameters:
        context - the context associated with the click
